name: Tutorcenter
body: # Tutor Center ## a way to use data and technology to optimize your school's tutoring center ##Instructions * Download and open the app * Log in with your **school** email account, accept the permissions * (we just need your email, picture, and name from this) * The switch at the bottom represents your status. Off means 'available', on means 'busy(tutoring)' * When a tutee arrives at the tutoring center, a teacher can input them with the web app. If you have marked yourself as available, then you will get a push notification showing the tutee's name and desired subject. --- Feedback? Email hi@ism.codes
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
